name: Inkwell (PixelatedBubbles)
description:
Forests are great for hiding perfectly normal places, like old Libraries! Pick up your Library Card (or don't, I'm not your mom), and then explore the Library! ....Or don't.  You can just turn around and leave, (maybe).  You just definitely, absolutely, positively need to be out before closing time.  Or I guess you COULD stay; sign a few wavers for me first, okay? I'm not responsible for what happens after the front door is locked for the night. 

A project created in Twine for a game design class Spring Quarter of 2022. 
Inkwell is a "choose your own adventure" flavoured text game, with multiple routes and endings! (Some of your choices even unlock other options!)
